TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1643-1644
TEI.2.document_title: George Orr to Stephen F. Austin, 05-23-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Orr to Austin, May 23, 1827. Concerning theft of horses.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1643-1644

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Orr to Austin, May 23, 1827. Concerning theft of horses.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Atascosito */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="05-23-1827">May 23,1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir Some days ago *person_mentioned*Burrel Franks*/person_mentioned* who lives on the *person_mentioned*Nachez River*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*near the lower crossing*/location_mentioned* was examined before *person_mentioned*Henry W. Munson*/person_mentioned* and myself relative to certain Thefts lately committed in this *location_mentioned*neighbourhood*/location_mentioned*— He stated among other things that a *person_mentioned*stranger*/person_mentioned* who called himself *person_mentioned*Hawkins */person_mentioned*had been at his house—that he (*person_mentioned*Hawkins*/person_mentioned*) with one *person_mentioned*Clement */person_mentioned*(sometimes called *person_mentioned*Reno*/person_mentioned*) were the *person_mentioned*persons*/person_mentioned* who had comitted the thefts on the *location_mentioned*Trinity*/location_mentioned*—that they had a cavalarde of sixty or seventy horses*location_mentioned* above the San Antonio crossing on the Trinity River*/location_mentioned* that those horses they had stolen from the *location_mentioned*settlements on the Brassos and Colorado*/location_mentioned*—I have thought proper to communicate this to you for the benefit of your *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*—for further information on the subject I refer you to *person_mentioned*Doct Brown */person_mentioned*who will hand this—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*George Orr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
